summary.title: Developer
summary.text: I am a developer currently using HTML/CSS, Javascript, C#, JAVA but i also do a bit of C/C++, playing sometimes around with unity3D and unrealEngine4 when i have some free time.

array.title: Developer
array.description: Software and web development, front-end/back-end, HTML, CSS, JS(AngularJS, JQuery), C#(windows application), SQL, JAVA(back-end server).

array.title: Internship as web developer (front-end)/(back-end) / developer C/C++ arduino
array.description: Internship as web developer in Javascript(vanilla ES6) and PHP, introducing people to the world of informatics and education programming with Arduino and C/C++.

array.title: Sales Assistant/Warehouse Operative
array.description: Inventory management, warehousing: pallet unloading, use of manual / electric pallet truck, customer support.

array.title: Maintenance of Medical Computers
array.description: Internship in the maintenance of computer equipment for medical clients and installation of medical management software (axilog).

array.title: Maintenance of Computers/Repair and Assembly of Computers
array.description: Internship in a cybercafé, maintenance of computers, repair and assembly of new computers to sell them later.

array.title: Computer Programming Trainning Course
array.description: Intensive training in central Marseille on web programming languages ​​(front and back-end), digital mediation with people with little or no computer skills , agile methods.
